Text.Text: This dish consists of deep-fried squid meat in a crispy cornmeal crust and is seasoned with a pinch of exotic herbs that give it an unique taste from the Peruvian coast.

Unlike tequila, mezcal can be produced from different types of agave, which gives it a wide variety of flavor profiles. Typical of mezcal is its smoky taste, which is created by the traditional baking of the agave hearts in underground earth ovens.

Pharisäer is a classic North German coffee drink consisting of hot, strong coffee, a shot of brown rum and sweetened whipped cream. The drink originated on a North Frisian island and is said to have been invented so that alcohol could be consumed secretly at church events without the clergy noticing.
